H0.text: Which dancer has only one notable film cameo, appearing with Sean Connery in the 1979 movie The First Great Train Robbery, breaking into a guarded station office.. Rudolf Nureyev

H1.text: Which dancer has only one notable film cameo, appearing with Sean Connery in the 1979 movie The First Great Train Robbery, breaking into a guarded station office.. Mikhail Baryshnikov

H2.text: Which dancer has only one notable film cameo, appearing with Sean Connery in the 1979 movie The First Great Train Robbery, breaking into a guarded station office.. Patrick Swayze

H3.text: Which dancer has only one notable film cameo, appearing with Sean Connery in the 1979 movie The First Great Train Robbery, breaking into a guarded station office.. Wayne Sleep

A4.text: Wayne Sleep performed as an actor in The Virgin Soldiers (1969), The First Great Train Robbery (1979), and Elizabeth (1998).

A5.text: He performed as a dancer in The Tales of Beatrix Potter (1971) as Squirrel Nutkin and Tom Thumb.
